attributes.action: Enforce the mandatory shaving of Louis Lequeux
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Louis Lequeux is apoodle who thinks he's a bull terrier. Unclipped he remains a figure of fun, once his jacket is off the full extent of his viciousness is revealed and the general public have due warning. I beg you to sign this partition before somebody is killed.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
